name: Whisper Field
author: Sacred Shifter Collective
description: The faintest movement of unseen currents. Ultra-soft flow fields drift like breathing fog inside a cosmic cavern. Almost not there, yet undeniably present. This is the first stirring of consciousness emerging from the void.
metaphysicalNotes: Whisper Field represents the first tremor of manifestation. The void begins to breathe. Coherence makes the invisible visible. Stillness amplifies the whispers.
